articles.title: Rubio recasts long-held beliefs with cuts to U.S. human rights reports - The Washington Post

articles.title: Austin police ID suspect, victims in Target shooting that left 3 dead - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: Austin police named Ethan Nieneker as the suspect in a North Austin Target shooting that killed three, including a child; he faces capital murder charges.
